special_abilities.name: Brute
special_abilities.desc: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Izek hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Izek makes two attacks with his battleaxe.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 13 (2d8+4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10+4) when used with two hands.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.desc:
Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 
Hit 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it catches fire.

name: Wereraven
speed: 30 ft., fly 50 ft. in raven and hybrid forms
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The wereraven can use its action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid or into a raven, or back into its human form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its human form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: The wereraven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The wereraven makes two weapon attacks, one of which can be with its hand crossbow.

actions.name: Beak (Raven or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 1 piercing damage in raven form, or 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage in hybrid form. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

actions.name: Shortsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 
Hit 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

name: Strahd Zombie
languages: understands the language it knew in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Loathsome Limbs
special_abilities.desc:
Whenever the zombie takes at least 5 bludgeoning or slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:

1-8: One leg is severed from the zombie if it has any legs left.

9-16: One arm is severed from the zombie if it has any arms left.

17-20: The zombie is decapitated.

If the zombie is reduced to 0 hit points, all parts of it die. Until then, a severed part acts on the zombie's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 8. Any damage it takes is subtracted from the zombie's hit points. A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet. A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll. Each time the zombie loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.If its head is severed, the zombie loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.The zombie's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zombie makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 4 (1d6+1) slashing damage.

name: Vampire Spawn
damage_resistances: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Vampire Weaknesses
special_abilities.desc:
The vampire has the following flaws:
Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.
Stake to the Heart. The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.
Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. 
Hit 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 
Hit 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 13).

name: Werewolf
armor_class: 11 in humanoid form, 12 (natural armor) in wolf or hybrid form
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

actions.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

actions.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 
Hit 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.desc:
Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. 
Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. 
Hit 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80 ft./320 ft., one target. 
Hit 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Zombie
languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Undead Fortitude
special_abilities.desc: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 9 (1d12 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Will-o'-Wisp
damage_resistances: acid, cold, fire, necrotic, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Consume Life
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 ft. of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (3d6) hit points.

special_abilities.name: Ephemeral
special_abilities.desc: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The will-o'-wisp can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

special_abilities.name: Variable Illumination
special_abilities.desc: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

actions.name: Shock
actions.desc:
Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 
Hit 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

name: Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 
Hit 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
